title: Vitality send FaZe to elimination pool; Cloud9 come back versus NAVI
description: Dan "apEX" Madesclaire's side crushed the reigning Major champions in a one-sided match.

title: Liquid trounce Sprout to claim first win; BIG overpower MOUZ to go 2-0
description: The North American roster rebounded with a comfortable victory after being destroyed in the first round.

title: IEM Rio Major surpasses 1 million concurrent viewers in group stage
description: The Major in Rio has already reached 1,000,000 peak viewers by the first day of the Legends Stage.

title: Xizt: "I'm very confident that we can go really far"
description: Richard "Xizt" Landstr√∂m spoke to HLTV.org about Heroic's improvement with Jakob "jabbi" Nygaard and the team's confidence heading into the Rio Major.

title: C9-NAVI to meet for first time in 2022 in Rio Legends Stage round 2
description: FaZe and Vitality will also clash in a secondary matchup between two top-five teams.

title: FURIA crush ENCE; fnatic edge out NIP to kick off Legends Stage campaign
description: The Brazilians harnessed the energy of the crowd as they join the 1-0 pool for the Legends Stage.

title: NAVI outlast Vitality; Heroic defeat Outsiders in IEM Rio Legends Stage
description: Oleksandr "s1mple" Kostyliev won the battle of the two superstars against Mathieu "ZywOo" Herbaut.

title: w0nderful on Major debut: "I don't feel nervous"
description: Spirit stepped into the IEM Rio Major with Major debutant Igor "w0nderful" Zhdanov leading the way in a 16-8 win against Bad News Eagles.

title: Cloud9 pull off comeback against FaZe; BIG take down Sprout
description: Finn "karrigan" Andersen's men threw away an 11-4 lead on Overpass before being relegated to the 0-1 pool.

title: MOUZ dismantle Liquid; Spirit best BNE in opening Legends Stage matches
description: Liquid were able to win just two rounds in their Major opener.
